entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
